name: UNIVERSITY OF ABERDEEN
info: Founded in 1495, blending tradition with innovation. Offers diverse undergraduate and postgraduate programs. Emphasizes research-led teaching. Fosters a supportive academic community. Located in scenic Aberdeen, Scotland.

name: Anglia Ruskin University
info: Anglia Ruskin University is a modern university offering a diverse range of undergraduate and postgraduate courses. Known for its strong focus on employability, it provides students with practical skills and knowledge needed in the job market. Located in East Anglia, UK.

name: PRIFYSGOL BANGOR UNIVERSITY
info: Bangor University, established in 1884, offers a variety of undergraduate and postgraduate programs. It is renowned for its research excellence and scenic campus located in Bangor, Wales. The university provides a supportive learning environment and vibrant student life.

name: BATH SPA UNIVERSITY
